example.text: The DC Council's recent effort to allow non-citizens to vote is just another example of the radical left's insane and reckless governance of our nation's capital, which has also precipitated riots, lawlessness, and a homelessness crisis in recent years. You can read more about my bill by clicking here.

News from Rep. Chip Roy CONTACT ABOUT ISSUES MEDIA SERVICES Dear , As I begin another busy week in Texas, I wanted to pass along my latest update on what I have been doing to fight for you, Texas' 21st Congressional district, and our country as a whole: Many of you watched the deliberations over the House Speaker's election over the past couple of weeks and many of you called in support, as well as questions, for what were fighting for up here. All in all, the final agreement is a tremendous victory for the American people, and I am proud to support it.

“We’ve sent over cuts that are in THIS year" “And it saves 5 trillion over 10 years, a TRILLION in year one” “You can debate some of them, but it’s something that would put us on a path to fiscal responsibility” #ShrinkDCGrowAmerica [[url]]
“This idea that [HR 2] is treating kids 'inhumanely'… President Obama, that radical MAGA extremist… asked for THIS fix in HIS bill!” WATCH: Rep. Roy sets record straight on border security [[url]]
We encourage you to take advantage of this federal assistance if eligible. Resources for wildfire and drought recovery and risk management are available here and here , respectively.

Taxpayer dollars should NEVER fund corrupt organizations – especially those masquerading good while regularly covering for some of the world’s most brutal and inhumane regimes That’s why Rep. Roy is pushing to cut funding for the so-called UN “Human Rights Council” [[url]] [[url]]

The DC Council's recent effort to allow non-citizens to vote is just another example of the radical left's insane and reckless governance of our nation's capital, which has also precipitated riots, lawlessness, and a homelessness crisis in recent years.
